Package org.sat4j.pb.constraints.pb

Class WatchPb

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sat4j.pb.constraints.pb.WatchPb
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, org.sat4j.minisat.core.Undoable, IWatchPb, PBConstr, org.sat4j.specs.Constr, org.sat4j.specs.IConstr, org.sat4j.specs.Propagatable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MaxWatchPb, MinWatchPb
    public abstract class WatchPb
extends Object
implements IWatchPb, org.sat4j.specs.Propagatable, org.sat4j.minisat.core.Undoable, Serializable
    Abstract data structure for pseudo-boolean constraint with watched literals.
    Author:
    anne
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
